1.title: Foothills
1.plot: Live the wild life in one of El Dorado's organic ranches, hitch a ride through El Dorado's legendary foothills and dive into the golden steep waters of the American River. Finally have a drink in one of El Dorado's world class wineries.

2.title: Lake Tahoe
2.plot: Explore Tahoe's darkest depths and get hooked on its biggest monsters, go on a high-tech scavenger hunt for treasures hidden in plane sight, then free your heels and stomp your feet at the annual Telegrass festival.

3.title: The Wild Side
3.plot: We explore Roller Derby in Lake Tahoe, an eccentric Barber with an obsession for all things bizarre and the El Dorado County Fair.

4.title: Going Green
4.plot: We explore going green as we visit South Lake Tahoe's 968 Park Hotel, then off to the Motherlode river center for some adventures and then we tour the Barsotti Juice factory.

5.title: El Dorado County History
5.plot: Cory Tapia takes on a tour of the Marshal Gold Discovery Park, then discovers the history of Hangtown followed by tips from some gunslingers from the Hangtown Vigilance gang.

6.title: Rubicon Trail
6.plot: In our season finale we explore the Rubicon in a 4x4 Jeep and take in some of the history with legendary 4x4 pioneer Mark A. Smith.

imdb.plot outline: Todd Stanley, the Emmy-Award-winning producer for Discovery Channel's Deadliest Catch, presents Experience El Dorado, a half-hour magazine program showcasing life in the California foothills. Veteran film and television star Perry King (Riptide, The Day After Tomorrow) hosts to explore life, culture, entertainment and adventure in the heart of the Sierra Gold Country.
imdb.title: Experience El Dorado
plot: _Experience El Dorado_ (qv), a weekly, half-hour magazine program, showcases life in the California foothills. Hosted by veteran film and television star Perry King (Riptide, The Day After Tomorrow).::Todd Stanley

Todd Stanley, the Emmy-Award-winning producer for Discovery Channel's Deadliest Catch, presents _Experience El Dorado_ (qv), a half-hour magazine program showcasing life in the California foothills. Veteran film and television star Perry King (Riptide, The Day After Tomorrow) hosts to explore life, culture, entertainment and adventure in the heart of the Sierra Gold Country.
